      • ida

        protected boolean ida(IDAStarNode currentNode,
          double pathLength,
          double upperBound)
        The recursive IDA star method. recursively searches for all nodes within the given f-value bounds.
        Parameters:
        currentNode - - the node we begin this sub search from.
        pathLength - - the path length calculted to the current node.
        upperBound - - the ceiling of our search critiera, nodes with an f-value greater than this will not be searched.
        Returns:
